mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT menu.id, menu.name, menu.show_always, menu.title, menu.path, menu.icon, menu.type, menu.component, menu.level, menu.button_type, menu.parent_id, menu.sort_order, menu.description, menu.status FROM a_user user LEFT JOIN a_user_role contact ON user.id = contact.user_id LEFT JOIN a_role_permission rp ON contact.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN a_permission menu ON menu.id = rp.permission_id WHERE user.id = #{userId} AND menu.status = 0 ORDER BY menu.sort_order ASC
